Vaccinations are an essential part of preventative care for pets. They help protect your pets from various diseases and infections that can be harmful or even fatal. There are core vaccines that are recommended for all pets, such as the rabies vaccine, which is required by law in many areas. Other vaccines may be recommended based on your pet's lifestyle, age, and overall health.
